sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SELMAST, a town of Persia, in the province of Azerbi- jan, containing about 2000 inhabitants, principally Nestorian Christians. It is famed for its lofty poplars and delightful gardens. It is seventv-five miles west-south-west of Ta- breez.
